DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess safety appropriateness sunscreen product use sport user , supervise outdoor use condition .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female , 18 65 year age medical condition skin determine subject ' dermatological medical history . The subject must Fitzpatrick skin type I VI . During selection process , potential subject must agree restrict sun exposure activity least 5 day immediately precede participation study . Subjects must willing physically able spend approximately 3 continuous hour sun , must agree immerse entire body water ( include face hair ) least 2 time water activity phase , must agree refrain take medication study might alter response sun exposure Subjects must agree refrain alcohol tobacco use course study Subjects must obey rule test facility Subjects must agree refrain tan bed usage significant non study relate sun exposure study
